title: Bug 109718: Tips in text item shows large content in one line
description:
INTRODUCTION 32. SOME OF THE ERROR MESSAGE DOESN'T HAVE ENOUGH INFORMATION FOR USERS TO IDENTIFY THE ERROR. 42.5 ADD JAVASCRIPT OBJECT 42.6 SUPPORT DROP IN THE GROUP HEADER 42.7 PROVIDE UNDOABLE TRANSACTION 42.8 USER PROPERTY REVISION 52.9 HELP GUI TO FILTRATE THE UNNECESSARY NOTIFICATIONS 53. ELEMENT EXTENSION 65. Save and put mouse on the text item

Expected Result: Tips shows in given format
Actual Result: Tips shows in one line
OB: When putting large content in a text item, the tips (hover-over help) is displayed in one line.
EB: The tips should show the content in the given format, instead of being displayed in one line.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the application
2. Go to the page with a text item
3. Enter a large content into the text item
4. Move the mouse cursor over the text item to display the tips

The tips should show the content in the given format. Instead, it is displayed in one line.
